[[Ulysses Klaw (Earth-616)|Klaw]], Klaw's troops, [[Aleksei Sytsevich (Earth-616)|Rhino]], [[Georges Batroc (Earth-616)|Batroc]] & [[Augustine du Lac (Earth-616)|Black Knight]] | Enemies = Formerly [[Wakanda]]n [[Wakandan Army (Earth-616)|Army]] & [[Wakandan Air Force (Earth-616)|Air Force]]; [[Erik Killmonger (Earth-616)|Killmonger]] | Origin = | Reality = Earth-616 | Status = Active | BaseOfOperations = [[Niganda]] | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Reginald Hudlin; John Romita Jr | First = Black Panther Vol 4 3 | History = ===War with Wakanda=== ... ===Civil war=== After the failed war against [[Wakanda]] and the fall of [[M'Butu (Earth-616)|M'Butu]], Niganda fell in a state of civil war, with multiple armed factions fighting each others, targeting governmental institutions and persecuting civilians,{{r|Black Panther Vol 4 8}} even using some of the artificial [[Mutant Lion (Earth-616)|artificial Mutants]] released from M'Butu and [[Erich Paine (Earth-616)|Paine]]'s labs.{{r|X-Men Vol 2 175}} Others were seen fighting those artificial mutants, helped by [[Ororo Munroe (Earth-616)|Storm]] and [[T'Challa (Earth-616)|Black Panther]].{{r|X-Men Vol 2 176}} Among those organizations were present the [[Niganda People's Liberation Army (Earth-616)|Niganda People's Liberation Army]], the [[Niganda Democratic Party (Earth-616)|Niganda Democratic Party]] and a third faction fighting those two groups.{{r|X-Men Vol 2 175}} ===[[Erik Killmonger (Earth-616)|Killmonger]]=== ... | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }}
